column1: Josuke (丈助)`samus`One of the few that can go toe-to-toe with Wario on his home turf of Japan.

column3: kirby`Top player from Peru, one of the only who can claim to have 4-stocked Isai in Pikachu dittos. He once played a match against SuPeRbOoMfAn that lasted 53 minutes.
